resources.string: The water temperature is a value relevant to a lot of people: Swimmers, divers, fishermen, and many others. But until now, there were no reliable ways to get real time information about the water temperature in the area you\'re interested in.

Today there are already some water temperature sensor networks, but usually there is only one sensor per lake (ignoring temperature differences for example near the mouth of a cold river) and it is often published only once per day.
We are building a network of low-cost low-energy water temperature sensors. This allows us to measure the water temperature locally and to show it to you in real time, for free.
This app, the server infrastructure as well as the water temperature sensor hardware is developed by the Coredump hackerspace in Rapperswil-Jona.
Find more information about us on our website: www.coredump.ch
